attributes.additional_details: To take care of our veterans after they leave the military,
attributes.background: When service men and woman leave the military, none should be left homeless, they should be housed as a priority

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Amend council housing points system so homeless veterans receive higher priority: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330763

Enshrine the Military Covenant in UK Law: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332503
